annotations.note: Day 3, Day 7, Day 14 timepoints referenced for organoid differentiation assessment.

Representative images of unsuccessful differentiation into SNR-derived organoids shown at 3d, 7d, and 14d post-isolation: tissue clusters with no NRs, NRs <250 μm in diameter, and multiple NRs. Scale bar: 250 μm.
Protocol differs from others by starting with carefully isolated SNRs instead of dissociated pluripotent or neural stem cell aggregates.
Isolated SNRs retain self-organization in suspension culture, giving rise to organoids with single rosettes.
MG-embedded SNR-derived organoids imaged at: immediately (a), 2 d (b), 20 d (c), 2 months (d), 3 months (e), and 4 months (f,g) after embedding. Scale bars: 1 mm.
